item.title: Create Docker Environment
item.description: Install WSL and Docker # Install WSL # In powershell or cmd run “wsl –install” Check wsl is version 2 by running “wsl –set-default-version 2” May need to install wsl2 online Install Docker # Install the windows version of Docker Desktop from https://www.docker.com/get-started/ Select WSL 2 instead of Hypervisor during setup Pull/Clone the repo # Clone the repo from this link: https://github.com/fax-app/docker_env.git Open the repo in VS Code Install the following extensions in VS Code: Remote - Containers by Microsoft Docker by Microsoft Open the terminal in VS Code Run the command “.
